General.Name: Suzhou Hesheng Special Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Hesheng Special Material Co., Ltd. research, develops, produces, and sells exterior composite materials in China and internationally. The company offers organic coated boards and film-coated boards for use in appliances, refrigerators, freezers, washing machines, and air conditioners. It also provides VCM and PCM composite materials. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Suzhou, China.
